Class CommandReadPreferenceHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mongodb.operation.CommandReadPreferenceHelper

  • public final class CommandReadPreferenceHelper
extends Object
    Help for managing read preferences for commands.

      • isQuery

        public static boolean isQuery(Document command)
        Returns true if the command is a query in disguise.
        Parameters:
        command - the Document containing the details of the command
        Returns:

      • getCommandReadPreference

        public static ReadPreference getCommandReadPreference(Document commandDocument,
                                      ReadPreference readPreference,
                                      ClusterDescription clusterDescription)
        Returns the recommended read preference for the given command when run against a cluster with the given description.
        Parameters:
        commandDocument - the Document describing the command to run
        readPreference - the ReadPreference requested for the command
        clusterDescription - the cluster description
        Returns:
